category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_control_wildcard_exception
preference.preference_description: The wildcard exceptions specified here take precedence over TC_control_wildcard preference. This preference can be used to control the number of required characters before a wildcard for a specified class and attribute. Format of the preference value is: <Class name>.<Real attribute name>:<Number>. This is a site preference.
